data.text: @cameronwilson No sick leave for casuals, no pandemic payments for those isolating, but don't be poisonous and petty when the prime minister gets it.
@cameronwilson The virus is just a cold and not serious and we should not let it hold us back and we should live with it and HOW DARE U mock him he could be really sick
@cameronwilson I don’t begrudge people making fun of scomo getting covid but I won’t cos I know the minute I do I’ll get nostril or dick Covid or something.
@b_leeder @brentusjoshea @cameronwilson But it means carry on like normal oh wait he disappears during a disaster 🤣
@brentusjoshea @cameronwilson Morrison is right though? And catching Covid is part of living with Covid.  As millions have in the past few months.
@cameronwilson I’d rather Albo get it now than during the election campaign. Scomo would legit think the same fir himself now
@cameronwilson scott morrison telling us we all have to learn to live with the virus, only to catch the virus himself is just how karma works yes
he's going to be 100% okay because he's rich and powerful. he's fair game
